name: PlanetaMessenger.org Libraries
short_description: The PlanetaMessenger.org Libraries project is a set of open source instant messenger libraries used and maintained by PlanetaMessenger.org. You can find protocol implementation for MSN, ICQ, ComVC networks for use on standalone and server applications.
